stanza.line: Or I shall live your epitaph to makemake
Or you survive when I in earth am rottenrotten
From hence your memory death cannot taketake
Although in me each part will be forgottenforgotten
Your name from hence immortal life shall havehave
Though I (once gone) to all the world must diedie
The earth can yield me but a common gravegrave
When you entombed in men eyes shall lielie
Your monument shall be my gentle verseverse
Which eyes not yet created shall oer-readoer-read
And tongues to be your being shall rehearserehearse
When all the breathers of this world are deaddead
You still shall live (such virtue hath my pen)pen)
Where breath most breathes even in the mouths of menmen
